name: Pad Krapow Chicken Recipe (Thai Basil Stir-Fry)
description: This pad krapow chicken recipe is spicy, savory, and sweet. It's all the authentic Thai flavors in one dish!

recipeInstructions.text: Place a wok or skillet over medium-high heat and add oil. Wait until hot, then toss in your garlic and chili paste. Sauté until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Place a wok or skillet over medium-high heat and add oil. Wait until hot, then toss in your garlic and chili paste. Sauté until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chicken and stir-fry until it's cooked. Don't overcook the chicken.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chicken and stir-fry until it's cooked. Don't overcook the chicken.

recipeInstructions.text: Add dark soy sauce, light soy sauce, fish sauce, golden mountain, and white sugar. Stir well, making sure each piece of chicken is coated with sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Add dark soy sauce, light soy sauce, fish sauce, golden mountain, and white sugar. Stir well, making sure each piece of chicken is coated with sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off the heat and toss in the holy basil leaves. Give it a good stir, making sure not to break the leaves. Serve immediately.
